headline: Ukrainian Interns for Sales or Growth Marketing
description:
Hello everyone,

Iâ€™m helping a university in Barcelona which is looking to place 37 Ukrainian students in internships.

We are going to provide SDR and growth marketing training through a partner, but I am looking for companies in need of SDRs and growth marketers.

These students will be trained and ready to contribute from day 1.

Ideally, this is a 6-month, paid internship which could lead to a full-time position. We will handle the admin stuff to ease international hiring.

If you or someone you know could be interested, please DM, send me an email at pablo@inteliom.app or connect with me on LinkedIn (www.linkedin.com/in/pablomacias).

Looking forward to hearing from you!
